title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
content: Google cloud been accured a lot companies data.Even the Market exchangers data Will be going to on Google cloud.The data Directionc Will be spread out all around the world.Google prepare us to go on digital world crypto and digital and countries is not depend much of their own local Free Will but more global markets and digital virtual world.As they move a lot data to the Google cloud it means we should be getting ready for global digital world probably bitcoin and crypto standard.Only few countries Will develope CBDC -s like ukraine and russia and some latin america countries CBDC-s are for emerging Market countries mainly.The Western countries Will relie on more USDT standard and bitcoin standard.Get ready for many banks are Also not needed anymore many Banks Will disapeare overnight.Many Banks just not needed anymore in this new btc digital world the biggest public btc success deniers are those who secretly buying up all the btc and crypto But get ready for local power cut offs Electric shut downs and partial internet outages.The powers to be know something that's why they use cloud to diverse the data storage options so that data and exchangers functionality dont rely on single location or country.Off course the safest countries in this times would be countries where Are the Google cloud data centers.Google Will be Like a new goverment together with exchangers and Markets.And the btc Will be on top of that all the way how the things Are moving now

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on February 16, 2023, 12:32:51 PM-cut-As they move a lot data to the Google cloud it means we should be getting ready for global digital world probably bitcoin and crypto standard.Only few countries Will develope CBDC -s like ukraine and russia and some latin america countries CBDC-s are for emerging Market countries mainly.The Western countries Will relie on more USDT standard and bitcoin standard.Get ready for many banks are Also not needed anymore many Banks Will disapeare overnight.Many Banks just not needed anymore in this new btc digital world the biggest public btc success deniers are those who secretly buying up all the btc and crypto -cut-Nothing on your text seems to make any sense. What does Google cloud and Bitcoin have to do with each other?Why would banks disappear overnight? That could collapse whole countries. Why haven't they disappeared already?Everything you wrote was nonsensical.
